Class FloatingText

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • FloatingText

  • public class FloatingText
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Adds a customizable text that floats upwards from where it was added and removes itself after a certain amount of time.
    Version:
    January 16th 2019
    Author:
    Kevin Biro
